text: 1.4: Ga 2.4; Ta 1.16; Hi 12.15; 2 Pi 2.1; 1 Zo 2.22Gumgi mbari, mbe wari vhaav zav, guigira Zisas khothɨgi gumgi gu mbigir vhen vergi. Mbe fhum guarara kha buni khergim, nta Fhe Bakɨme buni vhuuiŋ ki gavar ki. Mba khesharigi gumgi, mbe zumgum Fhe Bakɨme nɨman thivgirga, ana mbe suaŋv suaŋgirga, mbe fhɨri regɨrga. Mbe kɨr Fhe Bakɨme si gumgi ma. Mbe kɨr Fhe Bakɨme sav, anan kora muumbar mbe ana domdora suav, ana mbuim, mbarkɨrga tɨvi mbatɨgi anan hi. Mba khesharigi gumgi, mbe nzan Guman Pana bavira, Zisas Krais, ana nza Bakɨme ma, mbe kɨr ana segi.
